titles.title: A bill for the relief of Catherine Anne Bardole aka Kathleen Bardole and her minor children, Lisa Anne Farley, and Elaine Mary Farley.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 5/17/1988--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
